verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: escalated] [ARG1: a grudge against ABC] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: in the wake of the cancellation of " Roseanne] , " [ARGM-ADV: tweeting at the chief executive of ABC 's parent]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] escalated a grudge against ABC on Thursday in the wake of the cancellation of " Roseanne , " [V: tweeting] [ARG2: at the chief executive of ABC 's parent]
